pullRequest.title: Empi 54 not duplicate
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add an operation to resolve POSSIBLE_DUPLICATE links
Also ensure once a user has manually marked POSSIBLE_DUPLICATE as a NO_MATCH that it can't be set to POSSIBLE_DUPLICATE again

commit.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/master' into empi-54-not_duplicate

nodes.bodyText: Is this not handled via an interceptor already? Or are we worried about internal calls?
